locale.name: en-US
locale.title: Baby Farm Find HD
locale.subtitle: Exercise visual search ability
locale.description: This is a very interesting discovery farm children game in the pad, fully tap the visual ability of children Octavia, hiding in All kinds of animals, plants, fruits and vegetables on the farm can be found out. The operation is simple, the real person pronunciation, vivid and interesting. This is a wise choice for millions of moms and moms to open the door to the wisdom of the children! Young friends come to find a look, quickly to challenge your intelligence bar! * quickly nurture the baby's observation and visual search ability. * to improve the thinking ability of the baby's image. The rich theme and the barrier let the baby play enough, the more clever the more play!
locale.promotional_text: Quickly improve the baby's observation and visual search ability!

keywords.keyword: 拼多多机器人梦工厂碰碰狐宝宝美食街点点多纳多多宝宝巴士瓦贝儿歌悟空识字学数学未来骑士团宝贝英语说趣味食物火车总动员开心蔬菜小牙医美食节熊猫博士小镇画彩蛋悟空识字恐龙救援车马儿的神奇大冒险小企鹅乐园魔力

locale.name: zh-Hans
locale.title: 宝宝农场找找乐HD-培养观察力
locale.subtitle: 锻炼视觉搜索能力
locale.description: 这是平板上一款有趣的农场探索发现类儿童游戏，充分挖掘小孩子们明锐的视觉能力，把隐藏在 农场里的各种动物，植物，水果和蔬菜，统统找出来即可完成任务。操作简单，真人发音，生动有趣。 这是百万爸爸妈妈的明智选择，开启孩子们的智慧大门！小朋友们赶快来找一找，快来挑战一下你的智力吧！ ＊快速培养宝宝们的观察力和视觉搜索能力。 ＊提高宝宝们的形象思维能力。 ＊丰富的主题和关卡让宝宝玩个够，越玩越聪明！
locale.promotional_text: 快速提高宝宝的观察力和视觉搜索能力！
